game.name: Fast Lap Racing
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fast Lap Racing combines realism and fun. Drive street cars on challenging circuits, improve your car’s performance, customize its appearance and compete for positions on the global leaderboards for each track and layout.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fast Lap Racing combines realism and fun. Drive street cars on challenging circuits, improve your car’s performance, customize its appearance and compete for positions on the global leaderboards for each track and layout.
